resources.string:
- Created for Gcam LMC-8.4-R9 📱 Compatible with most mobiles. 🔄 Update 04/26/22 ⚠️ Sixth official version.
✨ Leica Mode: Gives you an attractive result with a touch of vignette and more intensity of colors. - LDR: Ideal for taking pictures of objects in the dark. - PRO mode: It is recommended to use it if you want a photo with more saturation and details, also use it in night photos. - B&W: For lovers of black and white photos. - Old : Gives a retro style result, like in the 90s. 🆕 Updated Color Transform. 🆕 New value of Merge Method and Sabre. 🆕 Fixed noise reduction bug. 🆕 Fixed issue with details.
💾 Copy and paste this XML file to the following path: Internal Storage / LMC8.4 ✨ Leica Mode: Gives you an attractive result with a touch of vignette and more intensity of colors. - LDR: Ideal for taking pictures of objects in the dark. - PRO mode: It is recommended to use it if you want a photo with more saturation and details, also use it in night photos. - B&W: For lovers of black and white photos. - Old : Gives a retro style result, like in the 90s. 🆕 Updated Color Transform. 🆕 New value of Merge Method and Sabre. 🆕 Fixed noise reduction bug. 🆕 Fixed issue with details.
💾 Copy and paste this XML file to the following path: Internal Storage / LMC8.4
👤 @Ronco7
